Unreality by Michael Allar

A next generation concept album for the current generation. An absolutely unique experience on 12" vinyl. Your record player has never spun like this before.

8 tracks that'll make you say "I can't believe I paid this much for this!"

Donate and support the album

"If this ever ended up existing, I know this will be a worthwhile regret."

Michael Allar, Musician

This album does not exist yet

Michael Allar has never made an album before. This album currently does not exist. It is just an idea.

This is where come in and can become part of the art.

Pre-order this album and you will receive one 12" vinyl record if and when this album is ever produced. All money raised through pre-orders will 100% go to the development effort of this album.

The track "compiling shaders..." will not be on the vinyl record as this would be physically impossible.

If by October 31st, 2023, no release date has been announced, all funding will be donated to a charity of Michael Allar's choice.

Donate and support the album

Album art design and ideation by Koray Hagen.

Album art photography by Alex Schultz.
